translations.The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max: The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize directive in php.ini
translations.The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_S: The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_SIZE directive that was specified in the HTML form
translations.The file was only partially uploaded: The file was only partially uploaded
translations.Could not write file to disk: Could not write file to disk
translations.A PHP extension stopped the file upload: A PHP extension stopped the file upload
translations.You are already using a custom theme. Th: You are already using a custom theme. Theming app settings might be overwritten by that.
translations.A dark theme to ease your eyes by reduci: A dark theme to ease your eyes by reducing the overall luminosity and brightness. It is still under development, so please report any issues you may find.
translations.OpenDyslexic is a free typeface/font des: OpenDyslexic is a free typeface/font designed to mitigate some of the common reading errors caused by dyslexia.
translations.A high contrast mode to ease your naviga: A high contrast mode to ease your navigation. Visual quality will be reduced but clarity will be increased.
translations.Universal access is very important to us: Universal access is very important to us. We follow web standards and check to make everything usable also without mouse, and assistive software such as screenreaders. We aim to be compliant with the {guidelines}Web Content Accessibility Guidelines{linkend} 2.1 on AA level, with the high contrast theme even on AAA level.
translations.If you find any issues, don’t hesitate t: If you find any issues, don’t hesitate to report them on {issuetracker}our issue tracker{linkend}. And if you want to get involved, come join {designteam}our design team{linkend}!
translations.Theming makes it possible to easily cust: Theming makes it possible to easily customise the look and feel of your instance and supported clients. This will be visible for all users.
translations.Name: Name
translations.Install the Imagemagick PHP extension wi: Install the Imagemagick PHP extension with support for SVG images to automatically generate favicons based on the uploaded logo and color.
